ðŸŽ¯ Primary Use Case: Searching and exploring multimedia files in directories with non-descriptive filenames, such as phone galleries, messaging app data dumps, and saved memes.
âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Full privacy (data never leaves the machine) â€¢ Text query-based search (visual aspects, transcriptions, OCR, LLM descriptions)
ðŸ“– Summary: kfe is a cross-platform file explorer and search engine designed for multimedia content. It offers text and similarity-based search capabilities, leveraging visual embeddings, automatic transcriptions, OCR, and optional LLM descriptions. The application is intended for use with directories containing up to 10k images and short audio/video files, providing a privacy-focused solution for exploring and managing personal multimedia collections.
